net.starype.minigameapi.features.standard

Class TeamManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.starype.minigameapi.features.standard.TeamManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feature

    public class TeamManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Feature
    TeamManager is a simple Feature which allows you to add teams in your game. This class contains also a list of Team as under features
    Author:
    Askigh
